SENTENCE.STRING: , officially the Republic of Costa Rica (Spanish: Costa Rica or República de Costa Rica, IPA: [IPA: [re'puβlika ðe 'kosta 'rika]]), is a country in Central America, bordered by Nicaragua to the north, Panama to the south-southeast, the Pacific Ocean to the west and south, and the Caribbean Sea to the east.
